alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duchesne County through 230 PM MDT... At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starvation Reservoir, or 7 miles west of Duchesne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Upalco, Arcadia, Talmage, Altonah, Utahn and Bridgeland. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 75 and 101. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 50 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin
